Class ReducedSchoolBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.softeng.network.reducedModel.ReducedSchoolBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ReducedSchoolBoard extends Object implements Serializable
This class is part of the reduced model and represents its school boards

  • Method Details

    • getEntrance

      public EnumMap<Colour,Integer> getEntrance()
      Returns:
      Colour EnumMap Colour of Integer, containing for each Colour the corresponding Integer number of student disks present in the entrance

    • getDiningRoom

      public EnumMap<Colour,Integer> getDiningRoom()
      Returns:
      Colour EnumMap of Integer, containing for each Colour the corresponding Integer number of student disks present in the dining room

    • getProfessorTable

      public EnumMap<Colour,Boolean> getProfessorTable()
      Returns:
      Colour EnumMap Colour of Boolean, containing for each Colour a Boolean, true if the professor of this Colour is owned by this SchoolBoard's player, false otherwise

    • getTowers

      public int getTowers()
      Returns:
      int number of towers available for this reduced school board

    • getHand

      public ArrayList<ReducedAssistantCard> getHand()
      Returns:
      ArrayList of ReducedAssistantCard, the hand of assistant cards still available to be played

    • getLastUsedCard

      public ReducedAssistantCard getLastUsedCard()
      Returns:
      ReducedAssistantCard the last assistant card played by this school board player

    • getCoins

      public int getCoins()
      Returns:
